title: Drawing, "Mary and Eleanor Hague in a Hammock", 1883
medium: Graphite, brush and gray wash on cream wove paper
inscribed: Possible inscription in graphite across bottom of sheet.
description: Two young girls wearing dark bonnets are seated in a hammock, facing left. Their legs are firmly placed on the wooden floor and the hammock streches from upper left to upper right.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Mary and Eleanor Hague in a Hammock", 1883.Graphite, brush and gray wash on cream wove paper. 1953-190-1.
